author: Cynthia R. Peterson

review: Pros- It is as good as the ROKU just a different format layout of displays etc..I have both the Apple TV and the ROKU and don't regret the Apple TV- It give you options to watch TV. For example I use Apple TV to watch Youtube/ ROKU to my knowledge does not have the icon for Youtube.Cons- Remote is too small and easy to hit the center point when you want to hit the sides. Also my version of iPhoto is not current and will not work with the Apple TV.  The Apple TV recognizes this and instructs you to buy the latest iPhoto app at the iTunes store.For $89 and free prime shipping: I would recommend it and I would buy it again because it gives me options away from my basic cable source.Update Dec-30th 2013: I asked my teen daughter which see likes better the Apple TV or ROKU and she said Apple TV because it was much faster than ROKU to access programs.  I'd never considered this point so keep that in mind when considering one or the other.
author: Keith

review: The Apple TV made life easier for me.  I have twin great nieces living with me while they attend college and purchased Apple TV to minimize arguments related to viewing choices. We created separate accounts and respect the varied viewing selections  (not me-I pay the bills!). It was easy to assemble, which they did without a problem. The price was great and the order arrived earlier than expected!
